title: Keys
body:
I have 10Keys made from key fragments, what am i supposed to do with them?
is there a way i can trade the keys for anything?
how come I don't get boxes anymore- I got 3 so far but in the past months just key fragments that do nothing.
can you earn blue or yellow essence ?

replies.body: You can use fused keys on Hextech Chests you earn through champion masteries.  There are a few requirements to earn these chests, like owning the champion and making sure not to exceed the limit for the week.  More information on this ix also available in our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  Hope that helps clear things up!
